issue.title: Support arbitrary Number implementation for Object and Number deserialization

repository.name: gson
repository.description: A Java serialization/deserialization library to convert Java Objects into JSON and back

issue.title: Several regressions caused by the switch to Gson

repository.name: google-api-java-client
repository.description: Google APIs Client Library for Java

issue.title: Add support for double feature flags
issue.body:
While here, make some minor cleanups + reorganization for boolean
feature flags

issue.title: Add explicit support for floats in JsonWriter.

repository.name: gson
repository.description: A Java serialization/deserialization library to convert Java Objects into JSON and back

issue.body:
This avoids floats being treated as doubles and having an unwarranted level of precision.

Fixes #1127.

issue.title: Add explicit support for floats in JsonTreeWriter.

repository.name: gson
repository.description: A Java serialization/deserialization library to convert Java Objects into JSON and back

issue.body:
Follow-up to comments on #2130, which introduced a new override which was not overridden by `JsonTreeWriter`. Also tweaks the doccomments for the `float`, `double`, and `Number` variants of `JsonWriter.value`.

Supplement to the fix for #1127.
